casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Torrey GRADY 179A14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2019 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Luke M. Everett, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for Grady, Torrey Dale. Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Nathan Freed Wessler, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, Brandon J. Buskey, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, et al.

*452The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of April 2019 by Amicus (UCLA-NCLF) to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2019."
